app.title: Ask AI - Chat with AI Chatbot
app.description:
Welcome to Ask AI – Discover Endless Possibilities Every Day!

Experience conversations with an AI that understands you, adapts to your mood, and personalizes interactions, making each engagement unique.

ASK ANYTHING, ANYTIME:
Ignite your curiosity and engage in fascinating conversations with historical figures, business gurus, or even your favorite celebrities. Built on the GPT-4o model, Ask AI is always ready to offer recommendations, inspiration, and information on any topic.

IMAGE GENERATION AND EXPLORATION:

- Be Your Own Artist: Use our AI generator to create images from text, visualizing everything from fantastic scenes to futuristic cities. Our AI turns your descriptions into stunning visuals – perfect for creating book covers, social media posts, and more.
- Discover Your World Through Images: Snap a photo of anything around you (buildings, art, landscapes) and instantly gain insights with our image input technology. Use the text-to-image feature to convert visual information into readable text.

ENHANCED TEXT GENERATOR FOR EASY WRITING ASSISTANCE:
Our AI-powered writing assistant helps you generate ideas, craft detailed outlines, and effortlessly compose complete articles or creative works. From professional emails to creative stories and songs, managing writing tasks has never been easier.

FUN LANGUAGE LEARNING AND HOMEWORK HELPER:

- Language Practice: Immerse yourself in new languages through interactive scenarios, like a samurai adventure in Japanese or managing a restaurant in Spanish. Ask AI, built on GPT-4o, makes learning fun and practical.
- Academic Support: Whether it's a tough math problem or a complex science project, use Ask AI as your reliable homework helper.

SMART SUMMARY ASSISTANT:

- Quick Summaries: Get the essence of long videos or detailed documents in an interactive and engaging format. 
- Ask Questions: Upload documents or add links to articles or videos, ask your questions, and receive instant accurate answers with the help of Ask AI.

EASY WEB SEARCH:
Need the latest information on technological innovations, fashion trends, or health tips? Ask AI Chatbot, scours the web to bring you the most relevant and up-to-date information, keeping you always in the know.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS AND CREATIVE INSPIRATION:
Whether you're searching for new books, planning your next trip, or seeking creative inspiration, Ask AI offers personalized suggestions and ideas based on your preferences and interests.

EXPERIENCE THE MOST HUMAN INTERACTIONS:
The friendly, conversational tone of Ask AI, and its ability to adapt to your mood, makes every interaction feel like you're chatting with a friend. It’s not just a chatbot; it’s a new form of AI companionship that enriches your daily life.

Join us on this exciting journey. Download Ask AI now and start exploring a world full of possibilities with the power of AI Chatbot.

Privacy Policy: https://static.askaichat.app/privacy-en.html
Terms of Use: https://static.askaichat.app/terms-conditions-en.html

app.summary: Chatbot & Smart Assistant, now powered by DeepSeek API

reviews.text: Everyone is afraid this app will diminish the role of teachers. But I asked it to teach me algebra concepts. It was so simple. I have dyscalculia and NVLD. With the AI, all of the obstacles disappeared. It's simple and it makes sense. Please don't take this app away from young students. This thing could seriously change lives, especially for people like me who struggle with traditional learning methods, but want to advance in math!

Exceptionally good app! They give you 3 questions per day, without paying for it. At $69.99 per lifetime cost, it might be a little too high for someone on a fixed income, like me. However it's worth saving for, especially when its answers seem to be well thought out and thorough. Internet searches might give you the same answers and then, maybe not. The easy solution would be to install it, use it modestly until you can afford the price. Just remember, the free version allows only 3 per day!

I subscribed to this app for a full year, and even after that it acted as if I was still a free trial user. I emailed the developer and tried several times over a couple of weeks' time to use Restore Purchases to get my subscription activated, but no dice. I emailed them again last week and I still don't have my subscription. Hopefully I can get a refund. Beware!

The app concept is amazing. I'm not a fan of AI (oldschool) but it's easy to see just how useful this is (especially for business). This world is making a shift. Now, I'm not app savvy. I simply notice a few things I'd like to see different. 1. Have a few seconds and an option to "undo" when you delete an entire conversation. 2. It won't always provide factual information (names of places, towns). 3. Ability to have longer conversations and stop a current one while "she" writes.

This app is actually very frustrating. Whenever I go in there to use it 50% of the time it gives me some weird message about the network error and completely deletes everything that I have written. You should also have the ability to look at my past searches on the AI app but it can't do that. And lastly, the audio parts of the app does not work. Whenever I try to click on the audio to hear the responses to my questions, there a lot of malfunctions and glitches

I love this app. I would have purchased it. However the only short coming is that there is no voice like the others (which I don't mind), but my biggest peeve is that it doesn't let you go too far with storytelling like (Genie) the other apps do - certain stories that feature small "controversal" elements. I would get this just for the story part of it, which is better than all of the others I've come across (which is why I won't purchase the others as well). I guess I'll have to keep looking.

I would have given this app 5 stars, but $32 a month, really? $7.99 per week for something I might remember to us 5-6 times per year, not going to happen. What put this app way ahead of all the others is how well the information is returned back that you request. On another downside, the AI read back is terrible, stops, and pauses. There are way better options, and this is NOT one of them.

I really like this app. It's great to learn things and it can also make great entertainment and can do many great things. It's just one thing I'm annoyed about. Whenever I change locations, the wifi strength will be different and it will think there's an error because of that. And if you put in a message, it will say there's a network error, and it will delete your message! I can't count the number of times I've lost big messages due to this issue. I either started over, or just gave up.

When I purchased the "premium" it stated that I would have access to all features. Now, after a month later I try to use features like link & ask, it prompts me to pay an additional $44/year to unlock those features; on top of the $30 I already paid. I've tried emailing them twice to no avail. Are you guys really trying to charge $74 for a year, when I know someone who paid $29 for a lifetime and has all access?? Seems very inconsistent.

This app is amazing and has helped me so much. But, I paid for the lifetime and purchased a new phone, and you can not transfer the subscription. I had to pay another lifetime membership fee. It has an option to transfer, but do not think that it works because it doesn't. I reached out to support and got one reply and then was ignored. Basically you have only have access to the app you bought until you switch phones. Other than paying an extreme amount, the app works great

app.recentChanges:
We fixed some pesky bugs and improved the overall performance of the app.

Greetings from ASK AI Team
app.AIReview:
Ask AI - Chat with AI Chatbot Review

Overview

Ask AI – Chat with AI Chatbot, currently boasting 30,508,505 installs and a robust 4.49/5 rating from over 1,000,000 users, presents itself as an accessible entry point into the world of advanced AI conversation. Positioned within the Productivity category, the app’s core offering is a chatbot powered by GPT-4o, alongside integration with the DeepSeek API for enhanced image generation capabilities. The promise – “Discover Endless Possibilities Every Day!” – sets a high bar, and while the app delivers on certain aspects of this ambition, it's crucial to assess whether its functionality truly justifies the popularity it’s garnered. The free pricing model is undeniably appealing, making it a low-risk option for users curious about AI chatbots.

Key Features

  • GPT-4o Powered Chat: The central feature is, of course, the conversational AI itself, leveraging GPT-4o. This allows for natural language interactions, generating responses that are generally coherent and contextually relevant. Users can pose questions on a vast range of topics, from simple queries to complex requests for creative content.
  • DeepSeek API Integration (Image Generation): Ask AI incorporates an image generation feature powered by the DeepSeek API. Users can input text prompts to generate images directly within the chat interface. This adds a multi-faceted element to the experience, moving beyond purely textual interaction.
  • Historical Figure & Celebrity Simulations: The app explicitly highlights its ability to simulate conversations with historical figures and celebrities. While potentially engaging, the accuracy and depth of these simulations are areas requiring further scrutiny (detailed below).
  • Recommendation & Inspiration Engine: The app aims to be more than just a conversational tool; it positions itself as a source for recommendations and inspiration across various domains.
  • Multi-Platform Availability: The app is available on both iOS and Android, expanding its potential user base.

Strengths

  • Accessibility of GPT-4o: The core strength lies in providing access to the impressive capabilities of GPT-4o without requiring users to navigate complex APIs or pay for premium services directly. This democratizes access to a powerful AI model.
  • Seamless Image Generation: The integration with DeepSeek API offers a surprisingly effective image generation feature within a familiar chat interface. Prompt engineering is rewarded, and the generated images are often high quality. This functionality differentiates it from purely text-based chatbots.
  • High Install Numbers & Positive Rating: A user base of over 30 million downloads and an average rating of 4.49 indicates significant market appeal and a perceived level of satisfaction among users. This suggests the app addresses a genuine need or desire for accessible AI interaction.
  • Intuitive User Interface (Initially): The initial onboarding process is relatively straightforward, guiding new users through the basics of conversation and image generation with clear prompts.

Areas for Improvement

  • Simulation Depth & Accuracy: While the simulated conversations with historical figures and celebrities are a notable feature, they frequently fall short of delivering truly engaging or accurate portrayals. Responses can feel rote and lack genuine depth, often relying on surface-level knowledge. The “celebrity” simulations particularly suffer from an overreliance on public statements rather than nuanced understanding of their personalities.
  • Contextual Memory Limitations: Like many chatbots utilizing large language models, Ask AI struggles with maintaining consistent context across longer conversations. Information shared early in a dialogue is often forgotten or misinterpreted as the conversation progresses. This significantly impacts the quality of sustained interactions.
  • DeepSeek API Performance Variability: The DeepSeek integration can occasionally be slow and unreliable, particularly when generating complex image prompts. Response times fluctuate considerably, impacting user flow.
  • Limited Customization Options: The app currently lacks options for users to customize the AI’s personality or conversation style beyond basic settings.
  • Lack of Advanced Features: Compared to some competitors offering advanced features like custom knowledge base integration or API access, Ask AI feels somewhat limited in its scope.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive during initial interactions. The chat interface is clean and uncluttered, making it easy to focus on the conversation. Navigating between the text-based chatbot and the image generation feature is intuitive. However, as conversations become more complex or extended, the issues with contextual memory and DeepSeek API performance begin to detract from the overall experience. The initial impression of a polished and responsive AI quickly fades when encountering limitations in its capabilities. The app's reliance on internet connectivity is also critical; offline functionality is non-existent.

Value for Money

Given that Ask AI is completely free, it offers exceptional value for money. Users gain access to a powerful AI chatbot and image generation tool without any financial commitment. This makes it an ideal option for individuals exploring AI technologies or seeking a convenient tool for brainstorming, content creation, or casual conversation. The lack of in-app purchases further enhances its accessibility.

Conclusion

Ask AI – Chat with AI Chatbot is a solid entry point into the world of conversational AI, particularly for users new to the technology. Powered by GPT-4o and enhanced with DeepSeek image generation, it provides a functional and surprisingly capable experience, especially considering its free price tag. However, limitations in contextual memory, simulation depth, and occasional API performance issues prevent it from reaching its full potential. While not a replacement for more sophisticated AI tools, Ask AI remains a worthwhile download for users seeking a readily available and accessible way to interact with an advanced language model and generate images on the go. Future updates focusing on improving conversational context retention and streamlining DeepSeek API integration would significantly enhance the overall user experience and solidify its position in the competitive chatbot landscape.
